txt.en: Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'I suppose I can worry less thanks to your efforts. Still, the tide of enemies advances. We must remain strong and protect the White City at all costs.'
Easterling riders can be found in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defeat Easterling riders.

'Could the S没halar axe-men know about the Rohirrim? If this is true, what accursed magic gives them this tactical advantage?

'Perhaps I am thinking too much, but I cannot devise another reason as to why the S没halar would be patrolling the fields north of here.

'We must do something about this!'
Easterling riders lurking close to the Rammas in Talath Anor worry Ingold, for their purpose is unknown.
